result.name: skills-conditionality-pilot
result.notes: Skills conditionality involved Jobcentre Plus referring claimants to a skills training provider, Further Education College or Next Step adviser with potential benefit sanctions for non-participation. The training included vocational skills; basic skills, such as literacy, numeracy and employability training. This dataset recorded the outcomes of participation in the scheme, and included geographical and individual level data

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Skills Conditionality Pilot
